<div id="iframe_page_title">
    <h1 class="page_title">教师个人信息</h1>
</div>

<div id="iframe_page_topic">

    <table style="TABLE-LAYOUT: fixed;WORD-WRAP: break-word" class="border_table" width="616" cellspacing="0" bordercolor="#dcdcdc" border="1">
  <tbody><tr>
    <td style="height: 30px" width="90" align="center">姓名</td>
    <td style="height: 30px" width="247">&nbsp;傅慧源</td>
    <td rowspan="9" width="230" valign="middle" height="30" align="center"><img src="teacherpic/傅慧源.jpg" style="display:block; max-width:230px; max-height:460px; width:auto; height:auto;"></td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td style="height: 30px" align="center">性别</td>
    <td style="height: 30px">&nbsp;男</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td height="30" align="center">职务</td>
    <td height="30">&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td height="30" align="center">学术兼职</td>
    <td height="30">&nbsp;IEEE/ACM/CCF会员</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td height="30" align="center">老师类型</td>
    <td height="30">&nbsp;硕导</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td height="30" align="center">所属中心</td>
    <td height="30">&nbsp;物联网技术中心</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td height="30" align="center">职称</td>
    <td height="30">&nbsp;副教授</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td height="30" align="center">承担课程</td>
    <td height="30">
        多媒体技术</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td style="height: 30px" align="center">研究方向</td>
    <td style="height: 30px">&nbsp;视频大数据、机器学习与模式识别、多媒体系统</td>
  </tr>
   <tr>
    <td style="height: 30px" align="center">个人介绍</td>
    <td colspan="2" style="height: 30px">&nbsp;傅慧源，男，博士，北京邮电大学计算机学院副教授。2014年在北京邮电大学获博士学位。主要研究方向为视频大数据、机器学习与模式识别、多媒体系统等。主持和参与多项国家自然科学基金、国家973项目、国家863项目和企业研发项目。近年来在视觉计算与多媒体系统等领域取得一系列创新性成果，在国际权威会议ACM&nbsp;Multimedia、IEEE&nbsp;ICME、IEEE&nbsp;ICASSP、IEEE&nbsp;ICIP、IEEE&nbsp;ICPR、ACM/IEEE&nbsp;ICDSC等，以及国际国内重要刊物Neurocomputing、Multimedia&nbsp;Tools&nbsp;and&nbsp;Applications、Pervasive&nbsp;and&nbsp;Mobile&nbsp;Computing、Mobile&nbsp;Information&nbsp;Systems、计算机学报等发表SCI或EI检索论文20余篇。曾担任多个国际学术会议和刊物的论文评阅人。已获4项软件著作权，并已申请20余项国家发明专利及2项国际发明专利。<br></td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td style="height: 30px" align="center">承担课题</td>
    <td colspan="2" style="height: 30px">&nbsp;自2008年以来，作为项目负责人或主研人成功完成了多项国家级、省部级项目，以及多项企业合作项目。如国家973计划项目“物联网体系结构基础研究”、国家863计划项目“机动车辆行为过程快速获取与建模技术”、国家自然科学基金杰出青年项目“网络环境中多媒体计算”、国家物联网专项项目“基于物联网技术的智慧监狱系统”等。与华为技术有限公司、中兴通讯股份有限公司、浙江大华技术股份有限公司、亿阳信通股份有限公司、中国电信上海研究院、中国电子集团第六研究所等单位广泛开展产学研合作。目前主持的在研项目包括：国家自然科学基金重点项目（合作）“面向智慧城市的大规模信息处理与智能计算理论与技术”、国家自然科学基金项目“基于视频大数据分析的全天候监测场景理解技术研究”、北邮青年科研创新计划专项“敏感监控区域暴力事件实时高精度检测技术研究”等。</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td style="height: 30px" align="center">获奖和成果</td>
    <td colspan="2" style="height: 30px">&nbsp;北京邮电大学优秀本科毕业设计论文指导教师奖（2016年）；<br>北京邮电大学计算机学院科研贡献奖（2016年）；<br>第17届IEEE国际多媒体年会（IEEE&nbsp;ICME）最佳学生论文奖（2016年）；<br>第8届ACM/IEEE国际分布式智能摄像会议（ACM/IEEE&nbsp;ICDSC）最佳论文奖亚军（2014年）。<br></td>
  </tr>
   <tr>
    <td style="height: 30px" align="center">
        发表论文</td>
    <td colspan="2" style="height: 30px">近5年发表部分代表性论文：<br>[1]&nbsp;Huiyuan&nbsp;Fu,&nbsp;Huadong&nbsp;Ma,&nbsp;Yinxin&nbsp;Liu,&nbsp;and&nbsp;Dawei&nbsp;Lu,“A&nbsp;Vehicle&nbsp;Classification&nbsp;System&nbsp;Based&nbsp;on&nbsp;Hierarchical&nbsp;Multi-SVMs&nbsp;in&nbsp;Crowded&nbsp;Traffic&nbsp;Scenes,”&nbsp;Neurocomputing,&nbsp;vol.&nbsp;211,&nbsp;pp:&nbsp;182-190,&nbsp;2016.&nbsp;<br>[2]&nbsp;Huiyuan&nbsp;Fu,&nbsp;Huadong&nbsp;Ma,&nbsp;and&nbsp;Hongtian&nbsp;Xiao,“Scene-adaptive&nbsp;Accurate&nbsp;and&nbsp;Fast&nbsp;Vertical&nbsp;Crowd&nbsp;Counting&nbsp;via&nbsp;Joint&nbsp;Using&nbsp;Depth&nbsp;and&nbsp;Color&nbsp;Information,”&nbsp;Multimedia&nbsp;Tools&nbsp;and&nbsp;Applications&nbsp;(MTAP),&nbsp;vol.&nbsp;73,&nbsp;no.&nbsp;1,&nbsp;pp:&nbsp;273-289,&nbsp;2014.&nbsp;<br>[3]&nbsp;Huiyuan&nbsp;Fu,&nbsp;Huadong&nbsp;Ma,&nbsp;and&nbsp;Liang&nbsp;Liu,&nbsp;“Specific-scene&nbsp;Oriented&nbsp;Pedestrian&nbsp;Detection&nbsp;in&nbsp;Visual&nbsp;Sensor&nbsp;Network,”&nbsp;China&nbsp;Communications,&nbsp;vol.&nbsp;9,&nbsp;no.&nbsp;6,&nbsp;pp:&nbsp;91-99,&nbsp;2012.<br>[4]&nbsp;Huiyuan&nbsp;Fu,&nbsp;Huadong&nbsp;Ma,&nbsp;and&nbsp;Hongtian&nbsp;Xiao,&nbsp;“Crowd&nbsp;Counting&nbsp;via&nbsp;Head&nbsp;Detection&nbsp;and&nbsp;Motion&nbsp;Flow&nbsp;Estimation”,&nbsp;ACM&nbsp;Multimedia&nbsp;(ACM&nbsp;MM),&nbsp;pp.&nbsp;877-880,&nbsp;Nov.&nbsp;2014.<br>[5]&nbsp;Huiyuan&nbsp;Fu&nbsp;and&nbsp;Huadong&nbsp;Ma,&nbsp;“Real-time&nbsp;Crowd&nbsp;Detection&nbsp;Based&nbsp;on&nbsp;Gradient&nbsp;Magnitude&nbsp;Entropy&nbsp;Model”,&nbsp;ACM&nbsp;Multimedia&nbsp;(ACM&nbsp;MM),&nbsp;pp.&nbsp;885-888,&nbsp;Nov.&nbsp;2014.&nbsp;<br>[6]&nbsp;Huiyuan&nbsp;Fu&nbsp;and&nbsp;Huadong&nbsp;Ma,&nbsp;“From&nbsp;Video&nbsp;to&nbsp;Text:&nbsp;Semantic&nbsp;Driving&nbsp;Scene&nbsp;Understanding&nbsp;Using&nbsp;a&nbsp;Coarse-to-fine&nbsp;Method,”&nbsp;IEEE&nbsp;International&nbsp;Conference&nbsp;on&nbsp;Acoustics&nbsp;Speech&nbsp;and&nbsp;Signal&nbsp;Processing&nbsp;(ICASSP),&nbsp;pp.&nbsp;1393-1396,&nbsp;Mar.&nbsp;2012.<br>[7]&nbsp;Huiyuan&nbsp;Fu,&nbsp;Huadong&nbsp;Ma,&nbsp;and&nbsp;Hongtian&nbsp;Xiao,&nbsp;“Real-time&nbsp;Accurate&nbsp;Crowd&nbsp;Counting&nbsp;Based&nbsp;on&nbsp;RGB-D&nbsp;Information,”&nbsp;IEEE&nbsp;International&nbsp;Conference&nbsp;on&nbsp;Image&nbsp;Processing&nbsp;(ICIP),&nbsp;pp.&nbsp;2685-2688,&nbsp;Oct.&nbsp;2012.<br>[8]&nbsp;Huiyuan&nbsp;Fu,&nbsp;Huadong&nbsp;Ma,&nbsp;and&nbsp;Shixin&nbsp;Wu,&nbsp;“Night&nbsp;Removal&nbsp;by&nbsp;Color&nbsp;Estimation&nbsp;and&nbsp;Sparse&nbsp;Representation,”&nbsp;International&nbsp;Conference&nbsp;on&nbsp;Pattern&nbsp;Recognition&nbsp;(ICPR),&nbsp;pp.&nbsp;3656-3659,&nbsp;Nov.&nbsp;2012.<br>[9]&nbsp;Huiyuan&nbsp;Fu,&nbsp;Huadong&nbsp;Ma,&nbsp;and&nbsp;Anlong&nbsp;Ming,&nbsp;“EGMM:&nbsp;An&nbsp;Enhanced&nbsp;Gaussian&nbsp;Mixture&nbsp;Model&nbsp;for&nbsp;Detecting&nbsp;Moving&nbsp;Objects&nbsp;with&nbsp;Intermittent&nbsp;Stops,”&nbsp;IEEE&nbsp;International&nbsp;Conference&nbsp;on&nbsp;Multimedia&nbsp;and&nbsp;Expo&nbsp;(ICME),&nbsp;pp.&nbsp;1-6,&nbsp;Jul.&nbsp;2011.&nbsp;<br>[10]&nbsp;Zheng&nbsp;Zhang,&nbsp;Huadong&nbsp;Ma,&nbsp;Huiyuan&nbsp;Fu,&nbsp;and&nbsp;Cheng&nbsp;Zhang,&nbsp;“Scene-free&nbsp;Multi-class&nbsp;Weather&nbsp;Classification&nbsp;on&nbsp;Single&nbsp;Images,”&nbsp;Neurocomputing,&nbsp;vol.&nbsp;207,&nbsp;pp:&nbsp;365-373,&nbsp;2016.&nbsp;<br>[11]&nbsp;Peiyan&nbsp;Yuan,&nbsp;Huadong&nbsp;Ma,&nbsp;and&nbsp;Huiyuan&nbsp;Fu,&nbsp;“Hotspot-Entropy&nbsp;Based&nbsp;Data&nbsp;Forwarding&nbsp;in&nbsp;Opportunistic&nbsp;Social&nbsp;Networks”,&nbsp;Pervasive&nbsp;and&nbsp;Mobile&nbsp;Computing&nbsp;(PMC),&nbsp;vol.&nbsp;16,&nbsp;pp.&nbsp;136-154,&nbsp;2015.<br>[12]&nbsp;Zheng&nbsp;Zhang,&nbsp;Huadong&nbsp;Ma,&nbsp;Huiyuan&nbsp;Fu,&nbsp;Liang&nbsp;Liu,&nbsp;and&nbsp;Cheng&nbsp;Zhang,&nbsp;“Outdoor&nbsp;Air&nbsp;Quality&nbsp;Level&nbsp;Inference&nbsp;via&nbsp;Surveillance&nbsp;Cameras,”&nbsp;Mobile&nbsp;Information&nbsp;Systems,&nbsp;pp:&nbsp;1-10,&nbsp;2015.&nbsp;<br>[13]&nbsp;Xinchen&nbsp;Liu,&nbsp;Wu&nbsp;Liu,&nbsp;Huadong&nbsp;Ma,&nbsp;and&nbsp;Huiyuan&nbsp;Fu,&nbsp;“Large-scale&nbsp;vehicle&nbsp;re-identification&nbsp;in&nbsp;urban&nbsp;surveillance&nbsp;videos,”&nbsp;IEEE&nbsp;International&nbsp;Conference&nbsp;on&nbsp;Multimedia&nbsp;and&nbsp;Expo&nbsp;(ICME),&nbsp;pp.&nbsp;1-6,&nbsp;Jul.&nbsp;2016.&nbsp;<br>[14]&nbsp;Dawei&nbsp;Lu,&nbsp;Huadong&nbsp;Ma,&nbsp;Zeyu&nbsp;Wang,&nbsp;Liang&nbsp;Liu,&nbsp;and&nbsp;Huiyuan&nbsp;Fu,&nbsp;“Automatically&nbsp;Stereoscopic&nbsp;Camera&nbsp;Control&nbsp;for&nbsp;3D&nbsp;Animation&nbsp;Production,”&nbsp;ACM&nbsp;Multimedia&nbsp;(ACM&nbsp;MM),&nbsp;pp.&nbsp;939-942,&nbsp;Nov.&nbsp;2015.<br>[15]&nbsp;Zheng&nbsp;Zhang,&nbsp;Huadong&nbsp;Ma,&nbsp;Huiyuan&nbsp;Fu,&nbsp;and&nbsp;Hao&nbsp;Huang,&nbsp;“Distributed&nbsp;Human&nbsp;Action&nbsp;Recognition&nbsp;via&nbsp;2D&nbsp;Conditional&nbsp;Random&nbsp;Field,”&nbsp;IEEE/ACM&nbsp;International&nbsp;Conference&nbsp;on&nbsp;Distributed&nbsp;Smart&nbsp;cameras&nbsp;(IEEE/ACM&nbsp;ICDSC),&nbsp;pp.&nbsp;1-6,&nbsp;Nov.&nbsp;2014.<br></td>
  </tr>
